== Re-Approval Application for the Florida LoCo Team (ubuntu-us-florida) ==
 
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="float:left; width:405px; margin: 0 0 0em 0em; "style="padding:1em; "><nowiki>[[File:Ubuntu_Florida.png]]</nowiki>
|}
The Ubuntu Florida LoCo Team is an active group that has been providing support and advocacy for Ubuntu Users within the state of Florida. We have a variety of members with all different skillsets, which really helps our team to support for the many different needs we've come across. We hold Ubuntu Hours, Participate in Users Day, and other Development projects throughout the Ubuntu Community.

* '''Communication:'''
** We are maintaining multiple lines of communication, including <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/FloridaTeam|a Wiki]]</nowiki>, a <nowiki>[[http://florida.ubuntuforums.org|sub-forum]]</nowiki>, an IRC Channel (#ubuntu-florida) and <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-fl|a mailing list]]</nowiki>.

* '''Local Advocacy:'''

*** Monthly presentations on Ubuntu for the Linux SIG (Brevard Users Group) - Melbourne.
  
* '''Community Educating:'''

*** Free software awareness day in September 2011 at the University of South Florida, Tampa campus, during USF's first annual Tech Fair. A Florida LoCo member attending USF setup an Ubuntu table and distributed Ubuntu CDs and information about free software and Ubuntu.

* '''Charitable Advocacy and Exposure:'''

*** Donated 6 Dell Workstations to Planet Linux Caffe with Lubuntu 11.10 on them. PLC then gave the machines to several needy families - Miami.
